column1: There is promise with a new drug . It’s name is Remdesivir and it has shown to shorten the duration of COVID-19 Coronavirus snd the number of deaths is lower. Let’s keep our fingers crossed!
Good news with a new drug (Remdesivir) which has shown promise against COVID-19 Coronavirus. So far it shortens the duration of the disease and the number of deaths are lower.
Im being sarcastic bro, Im tryna play football again and live life normally. Corona virus was already a factor, now the people are bringing everything back down again.
